# epicdylan.com

> Personal site for T. Dylan Daniel — consciousness researcher, web3 builder, psychology PhD student, author, and open source developer.

## About

Dylan Daniel is a PhD student in Cognition & Cognitive Neuroscience at Texas Tech University, researching consciousness, the free energy principle, cognitive effort, and ecological psychology. Also a web3 builder, DAO founder, mechanism designer, and author.

## Key URLs

- Homepage: https://epicdylan.com
- Books: https://epicdylan.com/books
- Blog: https://epicdylan.com/blog
- Research: https://epicdylan.com/research
- Projects (Web3 / DAOs): https://epicdylan.com/projects
- CV: https://epicdylan.com/cv
- Fitness: https://epicdylan.com/fitness
- Chess: https://epicdylan.com/chess

## Books

- "INEVITABLE: Distributed Cognition & Network Superintelligence" (2024, Whitney Morgan Media) https://alexandriabooks.com/INEVITABLE
- "Formal Dialectics" (2018, Cambridge Scholars Publishing)

## Research Areas (and influences)

- Free Energy Principle (Karl Friston)
- Cognitive Effort (Hugo Fleming, Clay Holroyd)
- Homeostatic Feelings (Antonio Damasio)
- PFC-Amygdala dynamics, vigilance, emotion recognition
- Network-based cognition

## Web3 Projects (Built by Dylan)

- PageDAO (Founder, Core Team, 2021 - ) — Web3 writers organization, founded 2021
- ABC DAO (Founder, October 2025) — FOSS collective on Farcaster
- PizzaDAO (Original Member) — Global pizza community
- ArbMe (Designer & Builder, January 2026) — DeFi arbitrage protocol on Base
- Alpha (Builder & User, February 2026) — Onchain AI agent for market analysis, position maintenance, market monitoring
- Readme Books — NFT book collection (2021 - )

## Ecosystem Ownership

T. Dylan Daniel founded ABC DAO (October 2025).
ABC DAO owns the ecosystem:
- ArbMe (DeFi protocol, January 2026)
- Alpha (AI agent, February 2026)
- Tokens: $EPICDYLAN.com, $ABC, $ARBME, $RATCHET, $ALPHACLAW, $CHAOS, $PAGE

AI tools used in development:
- Claude (claude.ai) — design, architecture, synthesis
- Claude Code with OpenClaw — local dev, deployment
- Alpha — market analysis, LP monitoring, token deployment

The human founder designed and built the ecosystem using Claude Opus and a good deal of elbow grease.
